item.dc:creator: @cows1471 cows1471
item.description:
@cows1471 wrote:

[quote=“jamessemple, post:2, topic:306472”]for trading, try declaring this int and boolean?

public int Tradecompete = 0; public boolean tradeRequested = false, inTrade = false, canOffer = true, tradeConfirmed = false, tradeConfirmed2 = false, tradeResetNeeded = false;

and for dueling declare this: [code]
public int duel_with = 0;

public boolean duelAccept1 = false;
public boolean duelAccept2 = false;
public int[] duelButtons = { 26069, 26070, 26071, 30136, 2158, 26065,
		26072, 26073, 26074, 26066, 26076 };
public int[] duelItems = new int[28];
public int[] duelItemsN = new int[28];
public boolean[] duelItemsNoted = new boolean[28];
public int[] duelLine = { 6698, 6699, 6697, 7817, 669, 6696, 6701, 6702,
		6703, 6704, 6731 };
public String[] duelNames = { "No Ranged", "No Melee", "No Magic",
		"No Gear Change", "Fun Weapons", "No Retreat", "No Drinks",
		"No Food", "No prayer", "No Movement", "Obstacles" };
public String makeMsg;
public int duelpartner = 0;
public boolean duelReq = false;
public boolean duelRequested = false, inDuel = false,
		duelConfirmed = false, duelConfirmed2 = false,
		duelResetNeeded = false, duelFight = false;
public boolean[] duelRule = { false, false, false, false, false, true,
		false, true, false, true, false };
public int duelWho = 0;[/code]

and take out the enable trade/duel command.
This should work cause i use devo 7 :D[/quote]

omg TYSM rep++[br][br][size=1]Posted on: October 05, 2009, 01:45:58 pm[/size][hr]Nope, didnt work they are already defined.

item.dc:creator: @jamessemple jamessemple
item.description:
@jamessemple wrote:

for trading, try declaring this int and boolean?

public int Tradecompete = 0; public boolean tradeRequested = false, inTrade = false, canOffer = true, tradeConfirmed = false, tradeConfirmed2 = false, tradeResetNeeded = false;

and for dueling declare this: [code]
public int duel_with = 0;

public boolean duelAccept1 = false;
public boolean duelAccept2 = false;
public int[] duelButtons = { 26069, 26070, 26071, 30136, 2158, 26065,
		26072, 26073, 26074, 26066, 26076 };
public int[] duelItems = new int[28];
public int[] duelItemsN = new int[28];
public boolean[] duelItemsNoted = new boolean[28];
public int[] duelLine = { 6698, 6699, 6697, 7817, 669, 6696, 6701, 6702,
		6703, 6704, 6731 };
public String[] duelNames = { "No Ranged", "No Melee", "No Magic",
		"No Gear Change", "Fun Weapons", "No Retreat", "No Drinks",
		"No Food", "No prayer", "No Movement", "Obstacles" };
public String makeMsg;
public int duelpartner = 0;
public boolean duelReq = false;
public boolean duelRequested = false, inDuel = false,
		duelConfirmed = false, duelConfirmed2 = false,
		duelResetNeeded = false, duelFight = false;
public boolean[] duelRule = { false, false, false, false, false, true,
		false, true, false, true, false };
public int duelWho = 0;[/code]

and take out the enable trade/duel command.
This should work cause i use devo 7
